sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import ForceGraph2D from 'react-force-graph-2d'; // Usage: class CypherViz extends React.Component { constructor({driver}) { super(); this.driver = driver; this.state = { query: ` MATCH (n:Character)-[:INTERACTS1]->(m:Character) RETURN n.name as source, m.name as target `, data : {nodes:[ {name:"Dan Wadwhani"}, {name:"Eugene Choi"}, {name:"Masataka Hosoo"}, {name:"Taeko Hosoo"}, {name:"Yoshida"}, {name:"John"}, {name:"Toryo Ito"}, {name:"Mae Englegeer"}, {name:"Hosai Matsubayashi"}, {name:"Hidehiko Matsumoto"}, {name:"Kawakami"}, {name:"Ami"}, {name:"Mitsuru Yokoyama"}, {name:"Garrett Uno"}, {name:"Ko Kado"}, {name:"Hide Suzuki"}, {name:"Sudo"}, {name:"Ethan Yu"}, {name:"Takahashi"}, {name:"Yusai Okuda"}, {name:"Annick Luo"}, {name:"Derech"}, {name:"Tien-san"}, {name:"Eddie"}, {name:"Yuki Kataoka"}, {name:"Michael Kozlowski"}, {name:"Koichi Saito"}, {name:"Osawa Kiyomi"}, {name:"Daido-san"}, {name:"Yui Tanaka"}, {name:"Alex Kimi"}, {name:"Vicki Dobbs Beck"}, {name:"Gala"}, {name:"Hirokazu Kato"}, {name:"Akiteru Kawai"}, {name:"Tenshin Juba"}, {name:"Daniel Calderon Arenas"}, {name:"Ariko"}, {name:"Genbei"}, {name:"Nanao"}, {name:"Nagano, Ishikawa"}, {name:"Shogo"}, {name:"Nina & Xavier"}, {name:"Nanjo"}, {name:"Aluan Wang"}, {name:"Masako"}, {name:"Sachihito Kudo, Kyo Karakami MARUNI"}, {name:"Gunma"}, {name:"Sky Whitehead"}, {name:"Yu Kamimura"}, {name:"Shoe"}, {name:"Marta Gasparin"}, {name:"Paul Niiro"}, {name:"Takeshi Shigemizu"}, {name:"Terui Yamawaki"}, {name:"Kimoto Yuriko"}, {name:"Ryoma Noda"}, {name:"Natsuko Toda"}, {name:"Morino Keito"}, {name:"Yandonghong Anna"}, {name:"Ota Kai"}, {name:"Banjo"}, {name:"Matsumoto"}, {name:"Shiho Fukuhara"}, {name:"Umi Chae"}, {name:"Takaaki Murase"}, {name:"Masaya Kushino"}, {name:"Kodama"}, {name:"Kodama"}, {name:"Hatta Shun"}, {name:"Fukutaro Nakayama"}, {name:"Yuna Yagi"}, {name:"Sander Wassick"}, {name:"Rintaro Akazawa"}, {name:"Mitasho-san"} ], links:[ {source:"Dan Wadwhani",target:"Eugene Choi"}, {source:"Eugene Choi",target:"Masataka Hosoo"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Taeko Hosoo"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Yoshida"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Mae Englegeer"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Hosai Matsubayashi"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"John"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Toryo Ito"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Hidehiko Matsumoto"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Kawakami"}, {source:"Masataka Hosoo",target:"Ami"}, {source:"Ami",target:"Hosai Matsubayashi"}, {source:"Ami",target:"Kawakami"} ]} } } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({query:event.target.value}) } loadData = async () => { let session = await this.driver.session({database:"gameofthrones"}); let res = await session.run(this.state.query); session.close(); console.log(res); let nodes = new Set(); let links = res.records.map(r => { let source = r.get("source"); let target = r.get("target"); nodes.add(source); nodes.add(target); return {source, target}}); nodes = Array.from(nodes).map(name => {return {name}}); this.setState({ data : {nodes, links}}); } render() { return (
